entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.5°C

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
